attributes.action: Scrap TFL & Replace it with a Central Government Miinisterial Department.
attributes.additional_details: A good example of TFL's failiure is the failure to renew ubers operating license by pandering to ludites and xenophobes.
attributes.background:
Scrap TFL and take it back under central government controll.

TFL is a failed organisation which is inefficient in expenditure and ineffective in policy implementation.

rejection.details:
We're not sure whether you'd like London public transport to be under the control of central UK government - perhaps as an additional responsibility of the existing Department for Transport - or whether you would like it to be a department or public body in its own right.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
